mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CorpProduct(productCode, productName, productInfo, productPrice, registrationDate, categoryNum, memberIdx, stateCode) VALUES (#{productCode}, #{productName}, #{productInfo}, #{productPrice}, SYSDATE, #{categoryNum}, #{memberIdx}, 0)
INSERT INTO ProductState(stateCode, stateNum, stateName, stateMemo, stateDate) VALUES (#{stateCode}, ProductState_seq.NEXTVAL, #{stateName}, #{stateMemo}, SYSDATE)

SELECT p.productCode, c.categoryName, s.stateCode, s.stateName, productName, TO_CHAR(registrationDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')registrationDate, productPrice, productCount FROM CorpProduct p JOIN CorpCategory c ON c.categoryNum = p.categoryNum LEFT OUTER JOIN ProductState s ON s.stateCode = p.stateCode
p.categoryNum = #{categoryNum}

ORDER BY registrationDate OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY

SELECT p.productCode, productName, productPrice, productCount, registrationDate, productInfo, c.categoryName, s.stateName, s.stateDate, s.stateMemo, o.productOrderDate, o.productOrderMemo, o.productOrderCount FROM CorpProduct p JOIN CorpCategory c ON c.categoryNum = p.categoryNum LEFT OUTER JOIN ProductState s ON s.stateCode = p.stateCode LEFT OUTER JOIN ProductOrder o ON o.productCode = p.productCode WHERE p.productCode = #{productCode}

SELECT p.productCode, stateName, stateMemo, stateDate FROM ProductState s JOIN CorpProduct p ON p.stateCode = s.stateCode WHERE p.productCode = #{productCode} ORDER BY stateNum DESC OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS ONLY
